export.name: Main Plates
export.description: Default nameplate configuration with threat colors and debuff tracking
export.setupInstructions:
1. Install Plater Nameplates from CurseForge
2. Type `/plater` in-game to open settings
3. Go to 'Profiles' tab
4. Click 'Import' and paste the export string
5. Click 'Okay' to apply the configuration
